page.title: 04CLERKHILL SHOPPING AREA
page.content: Clerkhill has a shopping area and lots of people go there for their food.Some people rely entirely on Clerkhill for all their goods,although some shop elsewhere in the town.The shops in the area are;the betting shop,2 newsagents,bakers,a hairdresser,the Clerkhill Inn,a chip shop,gift shop, post office,video shop and 2 supermarkets.People who use these shops live in the neighbourhood.Some people go daily to Clerkhill shops,and others just go weekly.They walk or come by car.Some people would like more shops in the area,although most are happy as it is.These are some of the shops people would like;iron mongers,health food shop,a clothes shop, baby shop,a bank,a draper,a cafe and a shoe shop.
